### setup

```{r load-libs, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(irlba)
library(scran)
library(scater)
library(igraph)
library(harmony)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytext)
library(patchwork)
library(BiocParallel)
bp <- MulticoreParam(10)
set.seed(241125)
```

### loading

```{r load-data}
sce <- readRDS("../outs/sce-lv1.rds")
ids <- list(
    epi="epi",
    str="fib|EC|SMC",
    imm="BC|PC|TC|mye|mast")
idx <- lapply(ids, grep, sce$lv1)
lys <- lapply(idx, \(.) sce[, .])
names(sub) <- sub <- names(lys)
sapply(lys, \(.) table(.$pid))
sapply(lys, ncol)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
stopifnot(sum(sapply(lys, ncol)) == sum(!is.na(sce$lv1)))
```

## selection

```{r sel}
sel <- lapply(lys, \(sce) {
    tbl <- modelGeneVar(sce, block=sce$pid, BPPARAM=bp)
    sel <- lapply(tbl$per.block, getTopHVGs, n=2e3)
    sel <- sapply(sel, \(.) rownames(sce) %in% .)
    rownames(sce)[rowSums(sel) > 1]
})
sapply(sel, length)
```

## integration

```{r int}
lys <- mapply(sce=lys, sel=sel, \(sce, sel) {
    reducedDim(sce, "PCA") <- RunHarmony(
        meta_data=sce$run, verbose=FALSE,
        prcomp_irlba(t(logcounts(sce[sel, ])), 30)$x)
    runUMAP(sce, dimred="PCA", BPPARAM=bp)
})
```

## clustering

```{r clu}
lys <- lapply(sub, \(.) {
    g <- buildSNNGraph(obj <- lys[[.]], use.dimred="PCA", type="jaccard", k=30, BPPARAM=bp)
    k <- cluster_leiden(g, "modularity", resolution=switch(., epi=1.4, str=1.2, imm=1))
    obj$kid <- factor(k <- k$membership, labels=letters[seq_along(unique(k))]); obj
})
lapply(lys, \(.) round(100*prop.table(table(.$pid, .$kid), 1)))
lapply(lys, \(.) table(.$kid))
sapply(lys, \(.) nlevels(.$kid))
```

## plotting

```{r pal}
pal <- CATALYST:::.cluster_cols
```

### compositions

::: {.panel-tabset}

```{r plt-fq-one, results="asis", fig.width=4, fig.height=2}
for (. in names(lys)) {
    df <- data.frame(colData(lys[[.]]))
    fd <- tally(group_by(df, pid, kid))
    p <- ggplot(fd, aes(n, pid, fill=kid)) +
        geom_col(position="fill", key_glyph="point", width=1, col="black", linewidth=0.1) +
        scale_fill_manual(values=pal[seq_along(unique(df$kid))], na.value="lightyellow") +
        guides(fill=guide_legend(NULL, override.aes=list(shape=21, stroke=0, size=2))) +
        ggtitle(bquote(bold(.(.))~"(N ="~.(format(nrow(df), big.mark=","))*")")) +
        scale_x_continuous(n.breaks=2) +
        coord_cartesian(expand=FALSE) +
        theme_linedraw(6) + theme(
            aspect.ratio=2/3,
            axis.title=element_blank(),
            legend.key.size=unit(0.2, "lines"))
    cat("#### ", ., "\n")
    print(p); cat("\n\n")
}
```

### reduction

::: {.panel-tabset}

```{r plt-map-one, results="asis", fig.width=15, fig.height=4}
for (. in sub) {
    nc <- ncol(sce <- lys[[.]])
    nc <- format(nc, big.mark=",")
    pal_k <- pal[seq_along(unique(sce$kid))]
    pal_p <- pal[seq_along(unique(sce$pid))]
    plotUMAP(sce, colour_by="run", 
        point_shape=16, point_size=0.01) +
        scale_color_manual("run", values=c("magenta", "cyan", "gold")) +
    plotUMAP(sce, colour_by="pid", 
        point_shape=16, point_size=0.01) +
        scale_color_manual("pid", values=pal_p) +
        ggtitle(bquote(bold(.(.))~"(N ="~.(nc)*")")) +
    plotUMAP(sce, colour_by="kid", 
        point_shape=16, point_size=0.01) +
        scale_color_manual("kid", values=pal_k) +
    plot_layout(nrow=1) & 
        guides(col=guide_legend(override.aes=list(size=2, alpha=1))) &
        theme_void() & theme(aspect.ratio=1, legend.key.size=unit(0.5, "lines")) -> p
    cat("#### ", ., "\n")
    print(p); cat("\n\n")
}
```

### markers

```{r mgs-kid}
mgs <- lapply(lys, \(sub) findMarkers(
    sub, groups=sub$kid, block=sub$pid, 
    direction="up", add.summary=TRUE, BPPARAM=bp))
```

```{r mgs-top-kid}
top <- lapply(sub, \(.) sapply(mgs[[.]], \(.) rownames(.)[order(-.$summary.logFC)][seq(20)]))
sapply(top, \(.) length(unlist(.))); top
```

::: {.panel-tabset}

```{r mgs-hm-kid, results="asis", fig.width=4, fig.height=10}
for (. in sub) {
    top <- unique(unlist(lapply(mgs[[.]], \(df) rownames(df)[df$Top <= 5])))
    pbs <- aggregateAcrossCells(sce,
        use.assay.type="logcounts", statistics="mean",
        ids <- colData(sce)["kid"], subset.row=top, BPPARAM=bp)
    hm <- plotHeatmap(pbs, 
        top, fontsize=4,
        scale=TRUE, center=TRUE,
        color_columns_by=names(ids),
        treeheight_row=10,
        treeheight_col=10)
    cat("#### ", ., "\n")
    print(hm); cat("\n\n")
}
```

## profiles

### aggregation

```{r ref-pbs}
pbs <- lapply(lys, \(sce) {
    ids <- colData(sce)[c("pid", kid <- "lv2")]
    pbs <- aggregateAcrossCells(sce, ids, BPPARAM=bp)
    sizeFactors(pbs) <- NULL
    pbs <- logNormCounts(pbs, log=FALSE)
    aggregateAcrossCells(pbs, pbs[[kid]], BPPARAM=bp,
        statistics="mean", use.assay.type="normcounts")
})
```

### selection

```{r ref-sel}
gs <- lapply(mgs, lapply, \(df) 
    rownames(df)[
        df$Top <= 200 &
        df$summary.logFC > 0])
lapply(gs, sapply, head)
sapply(gs <- lapply(gs, \(.) unique(unlist(.))), length)
```
